abstract: Chelsea Manning formally petitions Pres Obama to reduce remainder of her 35-year military prison sentence to time served; former Pfc Bradley Manning was court-martialed and given unusually long sentence for leaking classified documents to WikiLeaks.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Manning has been incarcerated for more than six years, longer than any other convicted leaker in American history.
snippet: Ms. Manning has been incarcerated for more than six years, longer than any other convicted leaker in American history....

headline.main: Chelsea Manning Asks Obama to Cut Sentence to Time Served
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Manning Asks Obama to Cut Her Sentence to Time Served
